title: The Linestrider Tarot Mini
features: A Fabulous Mini Edition of the
Small enough to fit in a pocket or a purse, you can carry this fun miniature deck everywhere. Spun with soft strokes of vibrant color and intricate detail,

features gentle yet evocative images that dance on the edge between magic and logic. With grace and innovation, Siolo Thompson's captivating art will enhance your readings in powerful and profound ways.

Linestriding is about walking in two worlds―one foot in each to discover guidance. Drawing inspiration from the edge while still moving forward on the Fool's journey, this Rider-Waite-Smith-based deck helps uncover the answers you seek.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/j21hu5jol7fts7ra92mat2bd5b._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Siolo Thompson', 'about': ['Siolo Thompson is a Seattle based illustrator, writer, and product designer. She is known for her clean, minimalist work and realistic renderings of the human figure and the natural world.', "Siolo Thompson's work has been featured in national and international shows, on book covers, in magazines and literary journals and was published as a tarot deck via Llewellyn Worldwide in May 2016. In 2018 she will have two follow up projects with Llewellyn; The Hedgewitch Oracle Deck and The Otherkin Tarot.", 'When not working in the studio you can find this eclectic artist roaming around the mountains, swimming in strange bodies of wild water, tucked away in a cozy library, or maybe in the kitchen whipping up something absurd from a 19th century cookbook.']}
